name: It Takes Two Girls
description: This is a unique casual and casual strategy game with dual map mode. Playing this game can experience the game experience of two beautiful girls jigsaw puzzles at the same time, of course, the rewards are also double after passing the level. Before the game starts, players have enough time to memorize and observe, and then through the continuous transmission of puzzle pieces from below, players need to put the correct puzzle in the correct position, and finally restore the entire picture, complete the level, and obtain exquisite CG.
